/.title: Home
/.purpose: Overview of business formation and scaling services

/starting-a-business.title: Starting a Business
/starting-a-business.purpose: Formation process and entity selection guides
topics: LLC vs S-Corp vs C-Corp comparison

faqs.pricing: Pricing varies based on your specific needs. LLC formation typically starts around $500-1000. Multi-state setups vary by number of states. We provide clear quotes during consultations.
faqs.timeline: Business formation typically takes 24-48 hours once information is complete. EIN issuance is often same-day. Website and system development varies by complexity but typically 2-4 weeks.
faqs.states: We serve businesses in all 50 states and coordinate multi-state registrations.
faqs.llc_vs_corp: An LLC offers liability protection with tax flexibility. A corporation provides strong structure for investors and stock issuance. The right choice depends on your growth plans and funding needs.
faqs.registered_agent: A registered agent receives legal documents for your business. It's required in every state you operate. We provide registered agent service in all 50 states.
faqs.ein: An EIN (Employer Identification Number) is like a social security number for your business. You need it to open bank accounts, hire employees, and file taxes. We obtain this for you.
faqs.multi_state: Multi-state operations require coordinated registration and compliance in each state. We handle the filings, maintain good standing, and track requirements.
faqs.compliance: Business compliance includes annual reports (varies by state), registered agent service, BOI filing (federal), and maintaining good standing. We handle all of this.
faqs.website: We build custom business websites that are mobile-responsive, SEO optimized, and connected to your business systems. Domain, hosting, and maintenance included.
faqs.custom_app: We build custom business applications tailored to your needs - internal tools, customer portals, automation workflows, and AI-powered features.
faqs.ai_tools: We integrate AI into your business through custom chatbots, document processing, data analysis, workflow automation, and customer service tools.
